Segment.name: ETD
Segment.comment: To specify information relating to premium transportation

Field.name: ExcessTransportationReasonCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the reason for shipment via premium transportation rather than the normal mode of transportation

Field.name: ExcessTransportationResponsibilityCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the organization responsible for paying the premium transportation costs

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ReturnableContainerFreightPaymentResponsibilityCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the responsibility for the return freight costs incurred when returnable containers are shipped in a premium transportation
